WE SHOULD PRAY FOR THE HOLY SPIRIT AS DID THE DISCIPLES AT PENTECOST.—The heart must be emptied of every defilement and cleansed for the indwelling of the Spirit. It was by the confession and forsaking of sin, by earnest prayer and consecration of themselves to God, that the early disciples prepared for the outpouring 
119
of the Holy Spirit on the Day of Pentecost. The same work, only in greater degree, must be done now. . . .
